items.sentence: I wasn\'t aware that Tom didn\'t need to do that.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom didn\'t want to do that.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom wasn\'t at school today.
Tom certainly doesn\'t have the money he used to.
Tom certainly isn\'t as popular as he used to be.
Tom should tell Mary that she shouldn\'t do that.
Tom shouldn\'t tell Mary anything about his past.
Tom wishes he could speak French as well as Mary.
Tom didn\'t let his children go to Mary\'s party.
When was the last time you went to a flea market?
I know Tom has enough money to buy what he wants.
I know Tom will sing that song if you request it.
Why don\'t you just say you don\'t want to do it?
There are lots of other things we could be doing.
I\'ve got to find something to do after I retire.
I\'ve just told you everything I know about that.
I\'ve heard that you\'re good at speaking French.
I\'ve heard that you\'re planning to retire soon.
Unfortunately, I wasn\'t able to keep my promise.
Tom had no way of knowing when Mary would arrive.
Tom handed Mary his canteen and she took a drink.
Tom handed an envelope to Mary and she opened it.
Tom has a backpack with a picture of a fox on it.
I\'m doing a lot more pushups now than I used to.
Mary was deeply affected by her husband\'s death.
There are noticeable differences between the two.
I wasn\'t able to buy everything I wanted to buy.
Would you mind telling me what this is all about?
I know you aren\'t stupid enough to believe that.
I\'ve spoken to your parents about your behavior.
Tom probably didn\'t even know about the meeting.
Tom said that he wasn\'t good at speaking French.
I wish I could do everything that I wanted to do.
I keep telling you I don\'t want to study French.
Tom finally got hold of the rare stamp he wanted.
Tom first met Mary when they were in high school.
Tom found an old coin just outside the back door.
Tom said he was really glad Mary moved to Boston.
Why don\'t you go out and play with your friends?
Why don\'t you just ask me what you want to know?
I haven\'t actually decided to build a house yet.
Tom dove into the water and tried to rescue Mary.
Tom got flustered when filling out the paperwork.
Tom had enough time to do what needed to be done.
Have I ever told you how I became a circus clown?
Have you been back to Boston since you graduated?
Tom and Mary excused themselves and went outside.
Tom and Mary have been best of friends for years.
Tom died a little after 2:30 yesterday afternoon.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t agree on which one to buy.
